channel.title: Striso board MPE controller - last day on Kickstarter!
channel.description:
During this month I've been running a campaign on Kickstarter for taking the Striso board, a new MPE MIDI controller with pressure and direction sensitive buttons, motion sensor and a logical isomorphic note layout that gives a different view on understanding and experiencing music theory.
I use it mainly with the Axoloti, I feel it's a great match.
Only 24 hours to go to get a Striso board on Kickstarter!
(Should have posted here earlier of course, just realised I didn't post about the campaign here yet...)
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/striso/striso-board

item.title: Striso board MPE controller - last day on Kickstarter!
item.dc:creator: @dreamer
item.description:
@dreamer wrote:

So nice that the kickstarter made it!

Having played on your Striso and with the Striso Board in the past I can say that it is a really nice way to play midi instruments.

Although I haven't gotten in on the KS I do hope you get to develop your devices more in the future and one day I get to have one in the studio

Read full topic
item.source: Striso board MPE controller - last day on Kickstarter!
